name: SCREW-NUT
description: SCREW-NUT - This is a game in which you need to melt the nut
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows  7/8/10 Processor: 1.2GHz or faster processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 512 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse and Keyboard
